name: solutionXMLNodeAttributeUpdater
instanceNameFormat: Mightora Power Platform Solution XML Node Attribute Updater
description: Easily update XML node values within your solution components during a pipeline run. This task automates the modification of XML nodes based on XPath expressions, allowing you to dynamically adjust key values in your Power Platform solution XML files. Perfect for scenarios where configuration values need to be modified on the fly in build and release pipelines.
author: mightoraio

inputs.name: XmlFilePath
inputs.label: Xml File Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path of the XML file we want to edit.

inputs.name: NodeXPath
inputs.label: Node XPath
inputs.helpMarkDown: The XPath expression to locate the node you want to update.

inputs.name: attributeName
inputs.label: Attribute Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the attribute whose value you want to update.

inputs.name: NewValue
inputs.label: New Value
inputs.helpMarkDown: The new value you wish to assign to the node.
